name: Spellbound (itch) (Vulpini Templar)
description:
You're not a particularly potent magic user but you've managed to get correct is Charm, knowing this and that there's a variety of love interests within reach that are stronger than you magic wise you set out to make an unstoppable harem of magic users.

How to Play:
Waves upon waves of enemies are incoming, you playing as someone that only knows how to cast Charm will have to survive the endless onslaught, but don't worry as charmed enemies will often join you and while you lack offensive capabilities they do not, should you die you shouldn't feel too bad as enemies you've charmed will usually grant charmed hearts which can be exchanged on the menu to power up those charmed prior, rinse and repeat!

Controls:> W/A/S/D or Arrow keys to move
> Left or Right mouse click to shoot/interact with menu

Furthermore:
I intended to make a SNKRX mixed with Tooth and Tail experience, I think I ultimately failed but as far as week long prototyping goes as well as lack of confidence in my capabilities I think it turned out pretty well.
